adHeader: Staffing and Bar tending 29.99 Ashbury & Malone
adDetails: Ashbury & Malone Do you need a Bartender/Chef/Server, three in one? 29.99 per. hour, three hour min. Drinks: Cosmopolitans, Margaritas, Ginger Martinis Whiskey sour, Apple Martinis, Mojito. We wear Bistro Attire, with a sliver tray. Need help with your small party? 1 to 100 Do you need someone to? 1 - Someone to make drinks/ bartending/ Make a special theme drink. 2 - Restock the platters of food throughout the evening. 3 - Wash glasses as needed for the bar and platters. 4 - Clean as you go, sliver tray pickup and drink service /empty trash, recycling. 5 -- You will go to bed knowing that the dishes are done and everything is back in its place. 6 Your house is clean. Why do it alone? Pickup the phone and call Ashbury & Malone show contact info or Text. We check our E mail at the end of the day.
